ðŸ“– Summary: Tweet-Machine is a Twitter OSINT tool that retrieves deleted tweets and replies. It produces three output files containing direct links, Wayback Machine links (for unavailable direct links), and a tweet timeline. This is useful for investigations where deleted Twitter data is relevant.
